description: Commonly referred to as Rose, he is the former captain of the 3rd Division. He became captain approximately one year before Urahara Kisuke. He is an effeminate man with long, wavy, blond hair and a frilly shirt. He seems to be interested in music, as he speaks to Love about an artist`s new single and has been seen playing or tuning a guitar on several occasions.
name: Ootoribashi Roujuurou
